content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Coal Mine at position (41, -82)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position (41, -82)) and a wooden chest at position (40.5, -83.5)
-  Burner mining drill is waiting for space in destination due to the chest being full

### Coal Storage at position (40.5, -83.5)
Consists of a wooden chest at position (40.5, -83.5) containing 800 coal

### Iron Plate Storage at position (41.5, -83.5)
Consists of a wooden chest at position (41.5, -83.5) containing 435 coal

### Inserter System at position (39.5, -81.5)
Consists of a burner inserter at position (39.5, -81.5) waiting for source items

### Furnace at position (0, 0)
Consists of a stone furnace at position (0, 0) with no ingredients to smelt and a full fuel source

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when extracting items from a full chest
-  Ensure the chest is not full before attempting to extract items
-  Empty the chest to continue extracting items

### Errors when inserting items into a full inventory
-  Ensure the inventory is not full before attempting to insert items
-  Remove items from the inventory to make space for new items

### Errors when extracting items from a non-existent entity
-  Ensure the entity exists and contains the item before attempting to extract it

### Errors when inserting items into an entity with a full fuel source
-  Ensure the entity's fuel source is not full before attempting to insert items
-  Remove fuel from the entity to make space for new items

# NAMESPACE
* No utility functions have been defined by the agent
* Important variables:
  - `coal_chest`: a wooden chest containing coal
  - `iron_chest`: a wooden chest containing coal (not iron plate)
  - `furnace`: a stone furnace with no ingredients to smelt and a full fuel source
  - `drill`: a burner mining drill waiting for space in destination due to a full chest
  - `inserter`: a burner inserter waiting for source items
